Hello, this PR is created by me. The only work it do is splitting the file Mathlib.FieldTheory.Galois.Infinite into two files currently named Galois.GaloisClosure (construct FiniteGaloisIntermediateField and adjoin about it) and Profinite (will prove that Galois group is profinite later in it). Any suggestions about the naming?
This is because in the original file the thing that can be stated seperately is mixed together, doing this can split basic constructions, profinite (stated categorically), and the fundamental theorem completely.
Sorry for causing this trouble because of my lack of overall design.
